title: Why do ios upgrades on my MacBook Air delete my firefox, open tabs, bookmarks and information
content: And when it does, how can I restore my open tabs and bookmarks from my synced information?
creator: tlevien

title: Netflix codigo de erro F7121-3078
content:
Boa noite poderiam me ajudar? já faz alguns meses isso, mas não consigo assistir mais netflix no firefox mas, aparece a seguinte mensagem

parece que seu navegador não é mais compatível com a netflix. Instale uma versão mais recente ou tente usar um novo navegador código de erro F7121-3078

Já limpei os dados de cache e ta atualizado. Eu quero muito poder voltar a assistir netflix no computador.... Por favor... uso o notebook. Ubuntu 18.04.5 LTS, 32 bits Tenham uma boa noite...
creator: paulinhasp148

title: Unwanted script/extention initiated requests
content: So I'm seeing unknown access to bsscommerce.com well as other sites being initiated by script/extension. This is a major problem with Firefox. Lack of Security. Also, it won't show which script/extensions initiated these requests. Thanks for nothing. Talking about security and privacy is CHEAP.
creator: simon1tan

title: You do not have permission to open the application “Firefox.app”.
content: Since updating to 90.0.2 I keep getting "You do not have permission to open the application “Firefox.app”. when trying to watch a short video from my emails, for example Epoch times or PragerU.
creator: viking00131

title: An error occurred:	SSL_ERROR_PROTOCOL_VERSION_ALERT
content:
When I am trying to search something on a search bar, it won't let me to do that using google search engine. When I am opening the network tab I can see An error occurred: SSL_ERROR_PROTOCOL_VERSION_ALERT error message.

Then I tried to change these settings https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1222439 but won't help.
creator: kevinmitnic

title: Hidden files
content:
I play cards at cardzmania.com using Firefox. If I exit Firefox and reload it, cardzmania remembers exactly where I was. Formerly, I could stop this by clearing the cache files at c:/users/user_name/AppData/Local/Temp andc:/users/user_name/AppData/Local/Mozilla. This no longer works. Even if I use Privazer to clear temporary Internet files, cardzmania remembers me.

In short, Mozilla is storing user data in a file I can't find and empty.

This disturbs me.

I'm not terribly concerned about cardzmania taking over my computer for nefarious purposes or spying on me, but the inability to find and delete files that permit cardzmania to remember who I am means other programs could do the same.
creator: etienne53
